body.head: NNA019488

p.note: See Publications of the Jesup North Pacific Expedition, Vol. X, pp. 195, 221.

body.p: Q!āʼnēqīᵋlax̣ᵘ started and came to Oldest-One-in-the-World. Oldest-One-in-the-World went down to the beach and stood on the beach in the sea. "I [you] am going to die here," said Oldest-One-in-the-World. Then he was turned into stone by Q!āʼnēqīᵋlax̣ᵘ, who was afraid of Łᴇxyāʼlik·ilayō.
